attributes.comment: How dare you even consider taking away my right to choose the sex of my care provider? Due to past trauma I only received my healthcare from female physicians. To add insult to injury since doctors will only be identified by their chosen gender, I also might have to submit to a transgender physician. That is absolutely unacceptable. What are you thinking? You cannot take away my right to no the true sex of my physician. Not there declared sex, their true sex. XY or xx. Only I have the right to determine who puts their hands on my body. How can you even consider this?

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
